Articles.Content: Floor 831-Due to some unique architecture you can see into floor 481 through one of the ouside windows-and it's upside down
Floor 832: A floor made of emerald with 70 Minecraft villagers playing on it.
Floor 833: Tons of islands.
Floor 834: a man in a banana suit attempts to sell you watches that are priced at "30 potatoes"
Floor 835: Hmm... Deja Vu...
Floor 836: A tower made out of Kerbals is seen.
Floor 837: Hmm... Deja Vu...
Floor 838: The floor has tons of lego bricks on it. Deadly.
Floor 839: Thread necromancers are seen.
Floor 839: Hay I can see my space station from here!

Floor 840:

You see a screen with this written on it:

8\2 = 4

4+80x10=840

Floor 841

Morgan Freeman sitting in a lawn chair with a sign saying Floor 842 and an arrow pointing up.
842: You have to go down to go to the next floor due to a gravity paradox.
843: You walk into the room where GLaDOS is, only for her head to explode when she hears the paradox from floor 842. The explosion propels you to floor 10,000.
Floor 10,000: You wonder what it would be if you weren't propelled the extra 9156 floors up by the aforementioned explosion.

Floor 10,001: You fall down a hole in the staircase down to floor 844.

You break all your bones in your legs and feet.
Floor 845: you find a lepricorn
Floor 846: You find a chair. That's it.
Floor 847: A hospital. You repair your legs and feet.
Floor 848: you find a big red button

Floor 849: the big red button in Floor 848 makes the windows shatter.

Good thing you didn't press it.
Floor 850: contain's lead, do not eat.
Floor 851: The graveyard for everyone who did eat the lead.
Floor 852: An indoor fireworks show. (WHO'S IDEA WAS THIS??!!??)
Floor 853: The firework will reach to floor 856. Also the show is still ongoing.
